name: Enthralling Allure
summary: The powers of domination employed by your progenitors have manifested in you as well.
description:
The powers of domination employed by your progenitors have manifested in you as well. Once per day, you can cast charm as a 1st-level divine innate spell.Traits

Dhampir: A creature with this trait has the dhampir versatile heritage. These humanoids are the mortal offspring of vampires and members of other ancestries.
